name: SEO – Remove H1
author: Bob Orchard

sections.description: Since most themes utilize the H1 tag in the template for semantic SEO markup, there’s no reason to allow the h1 to be used in the WordPress Editor. Tis plugin easily removes the H1 tag from the editor within the WordPress admin when activated.
sections.installation:
1. Upload remove-h1.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Updated version compatible since to 3.9.x

1.0.1

  • Initial version compatible before 3.9.0

short_description: Easily remove the H1 tag from the editor within the WordPress admin for SEO purposes.
description: Since most themes utilize the H1 tag in the template for semantic SEO markup, there’s no reason to allow the h1 to be used in the WordPress Editor. Tis plugin easily removes the H1 tag from the editor within the WordPress admin when activated.

upgrade_notice.1.0.2: After Wordpress 3.9 the theme_advanced_blockformats hook appears to be depreciated. I've replaced it with block_formats and an updated init to process correctly.

screenshots.caption: Screenshot of H1 removed from the editor
